name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Kisler STEPHENS, Appellant

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Kisler STEPHENS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: H. Stanley Rebert, Public Defender, York, for appellant.
Thompson J. McCullough, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
433 A.2d 4
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Kisler STEPHENS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted May 18, 1981.
Decided July 2, 1981.
H. Stanley Rebert, Public Defender, York, for appellant.
Thompson J. McCullough, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
